In my mind, REST or ROA thinking is an inversion over SOA thinking, and
tha=
t inversion is at the heart of people's difficulty with "getting"
REST.

So=
 I've been trying to find ways to make that flip easier, or more
understand=
able.

Here's my latest blog post which aims to do that:

http://duncan-cra=
gg.org/blog/post/mature-rest-easy/
<http://duncan-cragg.org/blog/post/matur=
e-rest-easy/>

Cheers!

Duncan Cragg
